relation: 11.0.2 (Molecular Environmental Sciences, STXM, ambient pressure XPS)
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {1982=Individual Beam Time Cutoff Scores for the Current Cycle (2015-2 Jul-Dec)}
textBeforeTable: Beam time is assigned based on each proposal's score in relation to all other proposals for a given beamline. For beamlines where beam time requests  exceed available beam time, a cutoff score is assigned after which no beam time is allocated.   Individual Beam Time Cutoff Scores for the Current Cycle (2015-2 Jul-Dec) The table below lists the percent of beam time shifts allocated/requested for each beamline and the cutoff scores after which no beam time was assigned. Don’t do Low priority Medium Priority High Priority Must do Scoring Proposals are scored on a scale of 1 to 5, with 1 being the best score and 5 the worst. Reviewers are requested to use the following ranking schema: Tuesday, 01 June 2010 10:34 General User Proposal Scores
textAfterTable: **Total number of beam time shifts, for all beamlines, requested by general users: 10,693.
